appetizers.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
appetizers.description: Hot delicious soup, perfect for a rainy day.
ingredients: chicken broth, egg noodles, celery, carrots

appetizers.name: Hummus and Pita
appetizers.description: Hummus and pita made fresh everyday.

appetizers.name: Garlic Parmesan Fries
ingredients: thick sliced russett potatoes, garlic, parmesan cheese
appetizers.description: The best fries on the planet!

coldSandwiches.name: Spicy Italian
ingredients: pepperoni, genoa salami, ham, hot peppers, vinigarette, onions, tomato
coldSandwiches.description: Thin sliced italian deli meats on fresh baked garlic pepper bread.

coldSandwiches.name: Black Forest Ham
ingredients: black forest ham, onion, tomato, mayo, mustard
coldSandwiches.description: Our signature black forest ham, thinly sliced on your choice of bread.

coldSandwiches.name: Chicken Salad Sandwich
ingredients: shredded chicken breast, celery, green onions, almonds, grapes, avocado, mayo
coldSandwiches.description: Satisfying chicken salad on sourdough bread.

hotSandwiches.name: Ham and Cheese
hotSandwiches.description: Hot ham and cheese on texas toast.

hotSandwiches.name: Philly Cheesesteak
ingredients: thin sliced steak, onions, cheez whiz or provolone cheese
hotSandwiches.description: Choose from our classic philly cheese, or switch it up with provolone.

hotSandwiches.name: Italian Beef with Au Ju
ingredients: thin sliced steak, sweet peppers, spicy giardiniera
hotSandwiches.description: Sweet and spicy italian beef with Au Ju sauce

desserts.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
ingredients: hershey's chocolate chips, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, butter
desserts.description: Ooey, gooey, warm chocolate chip cookies.

desserts.name: Slice of NY Style Cheesecake
ingredients: graham crackers, butter, sugar, cream cheese, vanilla extract, salt
desserts.description: Cheesecake that tastes like it came from the Big City!

desserts.name: Slice of Chocolate Cake
ingredients: sugar, baking powder, flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, eggs, milk, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, chocolate icing
desserts.description: Super sweet chocolate cake. The more chocolate, the better.

drinks.name: Mango Smoothie
drinks.description: Perfect blend of mango and pineapple in smoothie form.
